item.description:
Meet on the steps at Nashua City Hall at 5 PM.
Address is 229 Main St (Main & Hollis Sts)

Walk down Main St., which is closed off to traffic.
Organizers hand out lit candles that you can use.

Free concerts all evening at downtown venues (mostly indoors).

The schedule of performers is at this web site:

http://www.greatameri...

Stores are open along Main St. and other vendors are outdoors.

Assistant Organizer Neil

group.name: Fun in So. NH and Merrimack Valley

item.name: Nashua Holiday Stroll
